product_name: Marmot Zeus Down Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Marmot Zeus Down Jacket offers the incredible warmth and packability of 800-fill goose down. Wear it alone or as a mid layer in truly cold conditions. Premium 800-fill-power goose down is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth for its weight. Ultralight ripstop shell is downproof and has a durable water repellent finish that causes water to bead up and roll off. Draft flap behind front zipper keeps breezes out, while chin guard protects skin from abrasion. Features a drawcord hem and 2 zippered handwarmer pockets; left pocket doubles as a stuff sack. Marmot Zeus Down Jacket for men has Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves for unrestricted range of motion. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Marmot Zeus Down Jacket offers the incredible warmth and packability of 800-fill goose down. Wear it alone or as a mid layer in truly cold conditions.
